programlisting:
require 'aws-sdk-rds' # v2: require 'aws-sdk' # Replace us-west-2 with the AWS Region you're using for Amazon RDS. rds = Aws::RDS::Resource.new(region: 'us-west-2')
rds.db_clusters.each do |c| puts "Name (ID): #{c.id}" puts "Status: #{c.status}"
c.snapshots.each do |s| puts " Snapshot: #{s.snapshot_id}" puts " Status: #{s.status}" end end
